text: Kate Lehrer (born Kate Tom Staples; December 17, 1939) is an American writer, novelist and book reviewer. She was a panelist on the Diane Rehm Book Club on National Public Radio. She is the widow of writer and journalist Jim Lehrer. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:American novelists Category:Writers from Texas Category:Writers from Washington, D.C. Category:People from Waco, Texas
title: Kate Lehrer
